Additional types as a JSON file (or edit: Additional types as a JSON file (or edit below)
Adjust the mode from basic (with a limit: Adjust the mode from basic (with a limited number of beginner-user-friendly apps) to full (with all basic & advanced apps available)
Decimals decides the smallest unit of th: Decimals decides the smallest unit of the token, which is 1/10^decimals
Genesis Hash refers to initial state of: Genesis Hash refers to initial state of the chain, it cannot be changed once the chain is launched
Manage your connection to Ledger S: Manage your connection to Ledger S
Name of the network. It is only for disp: Name of the network. It is only for display purposes.
Override the default identity icon displ: Override the default identity icon display with a specific theme
Override the default ss58 prefix for add: Override the default ss58 prefix for address generation
Prefix indicates the ss58 address format: Prefix indicates the ss58 address format in this network, it is a number between 0 ~ 255 that describes the precise format of the bytes of the address
Save the type definitions for your custo: Save the type definitions for your custom structures as key-value pairs in a valid JSON file. The key should be the name of your custom structure and the value an object containing your type definitions.
Select the remote endpoint, either from: Select the remote endpoint, either from the dropdown on manual entered via the custom toggle
The RPC node can be selected from the pr: The RPC node can be selected from the pre-defined list or manually entered, depending on the chain you wish to connect to.
The color used to distinguish this netwo: The color used to distinguish this network with others, use color code with 3 or 6 digits, like "#FFF" or "#111111"
This is not a valid JSON object.
Unit decides the name of 1 unit token, e: Unit decides the name of 1 unit token, e.g. "DOT" for Polkadot
Your custom types have been added: Your custom types have been added
do not include empty strings in the gene: do not include empty strings in the generated file
include all empty strings in the generat: include all empty strings in the generated file
the language to display translations for: the language to display translations for
the module to display strings for: the module to display strings for
